verses.verse: Let <WG5015> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> be troubled <WG5015>: ye believe <WG4100> in <WG1519> God <WG2316>, believe <WG4100> also <WG2532> in <WG1519> me <WG1691>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1437> I go <WG4198> and <WG2532> prepare <WG2090> a place <WG5117> for you <WG5213>, I will come <WG2064> again <WG3825>, and <WG2532> receive <WG3880> you <WG5209> unto <WG4314> myself <WG1683>; that <WG2443> where <WG3699> I <WG1473> am <WG1510>, there ye <WG5210> may be <WG5600> also <WG2532>.
And <WG2532> whither <WG3699> I <WG1473> go <WG5217> ye know <WG1492>, and <WG2532> the way <WG3598> ye know <WG1492>.

Thomas <WG2381> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, we know <WG1492> not <WG3756> whither <WG4226> thou goest <WG5217>; and <WG2532> how <WG4459> can we <WG1410> know <WG1492> the way <WG3598>?

Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the way <WG3598>, <WG2532> the truth <WG225>, and <WG2532> the life <WG2222>: no man <WG3762> cometh <WG2064> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>, but <WG1508> by <WG1223> me <WG1700>.

If <WG1487> ye had known <WG1097> me <WG3165>, <WG302> ye should have known <WG1097> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> also <WG2532>: and <WG2532> from <WG575> henceforth <WG737> ye know <WG1097> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> have seen <WG3708> him <WG846>.
Philip <WG5376> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, shew <WG1166> us <WG2254> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> it sufficeth <WG714> us <WG2254>.

Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Have I been <WG1510> so long <WG5118> time <WG5550> with <WG3326> you <WG5216>, and yet <WG2532> hast thou <WG1097> not <WG3756> known <WG1097> me <WG3165>, Philip <WG5376>? he that hath seen <WG3708> me <WG1691> hath seen <WG3708> the Father <WG3962>; and <WG2532> how <WG4459> sayest <WG3004> thou <WG4771> then, Shew <WG1166> us <WG2254> the Father <WG3962>?

Believest thou <WG4100> not <WG3756> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG2076> in <WG1722> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> the Father <WG3962> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>? the words <WG4487> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> speak <WG2980> unto you <WG5213> I speak <WG2980> not <WG3756> of <WG575> myself <WG1683>: but <WG1161> the Father <WG3962> that dwelleth <WG3306> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>, he <WG846> doeth <WG4160> the works <WG2041>.

Believe <WG4100> me <WG3427> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> am in <WG1722> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> the Father <WG3962> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>: or else <WG1490> believe <WG4100> me <WG3427> for <WG1223> the very <WG846> works' <WG2041> sake <WG846>.

Verily <WG281>, verily <WG281>, I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, He that believeth <WG4100> on <WG1519> me <WG1691>, the works <WG2041> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> do <WG4160> shall he do <WG4160> also <WG2548>; and <WG2532> greater works than <WG3187> these <WG5130> shall he do <WG4160>; because <WG3754> I <WG1473> go <WG4198> unto <WG4314> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>.

And <WG3739> <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3748> <WG302> ye shall ask <WG154> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, that <WG5124> will I do <WG4160>, that <WG2443> the Father <WG3962> may be glorified <WG1392> in <WG1722> the Son <WG5207>.
If <WG1437> ye shall ask <WG154> any thing <WG5100> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, I <WG1473> will do <WG4160> it.
If <WG1437> ye love <WG25> me <WG3165>, keep <WG5083> my <WG1699> commandments <WG1785>.

And <WG2532> I <WG1473> will pray <WG2065> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> he shall give <WG1325> you <WG5213> another <WG243> Comforter <WG3875>, that <WG2443> he may abide <WG3306> with <WG3326> you <WG5216> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>;

Even the Spirit <WG4151> of truth <WG225>; whom <WG3739> the world <WG2889> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> receive <WG2983>, because <WG3754> it seeth <WG2334> him <WG846> not <WG3756>, neither <WG3761> knoweth <WG1097> him <WG846>: but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> know <WG1097> him <WG846>; for <WG3754> he dwelleth <WG3306> with <WG3844> you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> shall be <WG2071> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>.
I will <WG863> not <WG3756> leave <WG863> you <WG5209> comfortless <WG3737>: I will come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>. comfortless: or, orphans

Yet <WG2089> a little while <WG3397>, and <WG2532> the world <WG2889> seeth <WG2334> me <WG3165> no more <WG3765>; but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> see <WG2334> me <WG3165>: because <WG3754> I <WG1473> live <WG2198>, ye <WG5210> shall live <WG2198> also <WG2532>.

At <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> ye <WG5210> shall know <WG1097> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> am in <WG1722> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> ye <WG5210> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>, and I <WG2504> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>.

He that hath <WG2192> my <WG3450> commandments <WG1785>, and <WG2532> keepeth <WG5083> them <WG846>, he <WG1565> it is <WG2076> that loveth <WG25> me <WG3165>: and <WG1161> he that loveth <WG25> me <WG3165> shall be loved <WG25> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> I <WG1473> will love <WG25> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> will manifest <WG1718> myself <WG1683> to him <WG846>.

Judas <WG2455> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, not <WG3756> Iscariot <WG2469>, Lord <WG2962>, how <WG5101> is it <WG1096> that <WG3754> thou wilt <WG3195> manifest <WG1718> thyself <WG4572> unto us <WG2254>, and <WG2532> not <WG3780> unto the world <WG2889>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1437> a man <WG5100> love <WG25> me <WG3165>, he will keep <WG5083> my <WG3450> words <WG3056>: and <WG2532> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> will love <WG25> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> we will come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> make <WG4160> our abode <WG3438> with <WG3844> him <WG846>.

He that loveth <WG25> me <WG3165> not <WG3361> keepeth <WG5083> not <WG3756> my <WG3450> sayings <WG3056>: and <WG2532> the word <WG3056> which <WG3739> ye hear <WG191> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> mine <WG1699>, but <WG235> the Father's <WG3962> which <WG3588> sent <WG3992> me <WG3165>.
These things <WG5023> have I spoken <WG2980> unto you <WG5213>, being yet present <WG3306> with <WG3844> you <WG5213>.

But <WG1161> the Comforter <WG3875>, which is the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, whom <WG3739> the Father <WG3962> will send <WG3992> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, he <WG1565> shall teach <WG1321> you <WG5209> all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> bring <WG5279> all things <WG3956> to <WG5279> your <WG5209> remembrance <WG5279>, whatsoever <WG3739> I have said <WG2036> unto you <WG5213>.

Peace <WG1515> I leave <WG863> with you <WG5213>, my <WG1699> peace <WG1515> I give <WG1325> unto you <WG5213>: not <WG3756> as <WG2531> the world <WG2889> giveth <WG1325>, give <WG1325> I <WG1473> unto you <WG5213>. Let <WG5015> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> be troubled <WG5015>, neither <WG3366> let it be afraid <WG1168>.

Ye have heard <WG191> how <WG3754> I <WG1473> said <WG2036> unto you <WG5213>, I go away <WG5217>, and <WG2532> come <WG2064> again unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>. If <WG1487> ye loved <WG25> me <WG3165>, <WG302> ye would rejoice <WG5463>, because <WG3754> I said <WG2036>, I go <WG4198> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>: for <WG3754> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> is <WG2076> greater than <WG3187> I <WG3450>.
And <WG2532> now <WG3568> I have told <WG2046> you <WG5213> before <WG4250> it come to pass <WG1096>, that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> it is come to pass <WG1096>, ye might believe <WG4100>.

Hereafter <WG3765> I will <WG2980> not <WG3765> talk <WG2980> much <WG4183> with <WG3326> you <WG5216>: for <WG1063> the prince <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> cometh <WG2064>, and <WG2532> hath <WG2192> <WG3756> nothing <WG3762> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>.

But <WG235> that <WG2443> the world <WG2889> may know <WG1097> that <WG3754> I love <WG25> the Father <WG3962>; and <WG2532> as <WG2531> the Father <WG3962> gave <WG1781> me <WG3427> commandment <WG1781>, even so <WG3779> I do <WG4160>. Arise <WG1453>, let us go <WG71> hence <WG1782>.
